I can finally say that it works with both cracks. But not from the beginning. First it works as Blaze-Viper says. Just the VOVAN31337 crack unlocks everything. But it has some glitches and sometimes the game crash when it loads some of the special events. 

The strange thing is that, once you've played in all the special events with VOVAN31337's crack, if you put the RELOADED CRACK you'll have everything unlocked too and, the best of all, whitout crashes.

Thanks to ADHDerby for his help and this great unlocker.
